channel.title: Daniela Witten on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Daniela Witten on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Daniela Witten
item.description: “Banning p-values as a way to reduce irreproducibility in science is like banning strep tests as a way to reduce the prevalence of strep. As in, it does not work” - Daniela Witten
